sentences.en: A methane molecule is composed of one carbon atom attached to four hydrogens.
sentences.cn: 甲烷分子由1个碳原子与4个氢原子构成。

sentences.en: A molecule striking an advancing piston recoils with increased speed.
sentences.cn: 撞在前进中的活塞上的分子,会加速反跳.

sentences.en: Above a certain temperature, the enzyme molecule will become unfolded.
sentences.cn: 超过一定温度, 酶分子将会展开.

sentences.en: Glucose has a simple sugar molecule.
Scientists call this claw shape the antibody molecule's idiotype.
sentences.cn: 科学家称这种爪型为抗体微小颗粒的遗传型.

sentences.en: So tell me what this molecule does that makes it special.
sentences.cn: 那么告诉我这个分子有何作用而使其与众不同。

sentences.en: Such photons will excite the higher vibrational levels of the OH molecule.
sentences.cn: 这种光子会激发OH分子的较高振动能级.

sentences.en: The chemical structure of this particular molecule is very unusual.
sentences.cn: 这个特殊分子的化学结构很不寻常。

sentences.en: The haemoglobin molecule contains only four atoms of iron.
sentences.cn: 血红蛋白分子只含有四个铁原子.

sentences.en: The larger the number of heteroatoms, the more highly oxidized the molecule.
sentences.cn: 杂原子数越多, 分子被氧化的程度越高.

sentences.en: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.cn: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

sentences.en: The same holds true for any molecule with a center of symmetry.
sentences.cn: 对任何有对称中心的分子同样是对的.

sentences.en: The simplest covalently bonded molecule is formed from two hydrogen atoms.
sentences.cn: 最简单的共价键分子由两个氢原子组成.

sentences.en: The structure of the chlorophyll molecule is known . It consists ofporphyrin.
sentences.cn: 叶绿素的分子结构已经搞清, 它是由卟啉组成的.

sentences.en: This gives us the structural formula of the molecule.
sentences.cn: 这种方式给出了分子的结构式.

sentences.en: What happens to the molecule thereafter is of no concern.
sentences.cn: 分子继之发生的情况就不用考虑了.

trans.tran_en: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms
